channel.title: Shubao Liu Homepage
channel.description: an AI Researcher and Builder. Interested in machine learning, computer vision and natural language processing. Focusing on unsupervised learning.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
In this new website, I want to blog about my work and some fun stuff. The work topics will include unsupervised learning, deep learning, computer vision, etc. I hope you will enjoy it.

This site is built with Jekyll.
